name: Cookies and Dream
description: Cookies & Dream is a sativa-dominant hybrid strain that is a harmonious blend of fan favorites Blue Dream, also a favorite of lead artists Dominic and Jeremy of Big Gigantic, and combined with the robustly sweet flavors of Girl Scout Cookies. Ideal for social gatherings, this blend produces a euphoric body buzz and packs a strong sativa kick to keep your energy up. Cookies & Dream was curated in Colorado with love by Native Roots in collaboration with Big Gigantic to showcase this special blend.Â
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Euphoric, Relaxed, Talkative, Stress, Fatigue, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
